column4: anyone know why the mouse pointer dosent change when i change it by editing the theme's pointer?  it did work at first but now its not again, it will change if i edit the index.theme file but i dont want to have to do that every time i change mouse pointers
most likely culprit is compiz - see if disabling compiz corrects the pointer issue (i don't know a real solution)
i doubt you'll find anything in apropos for what you want :|
